QuestData.Title: Talgath's Forces
QuestData.Description: I must continue to seek the Crest of Knowledge, my friend. Nothing short of the whole Crown of the Triumvirate can turn the tide in the battle we face.$b$bTalgath's forces stand between us and that goal. I will need you to clear a path.$b$bWe can let nothing stand in our way. Not even Talgath.
QuestData.RewardText: <Velen does not seem to notice your presence.>
